stimulusHtml: Let h be the function given by h(x) = f(x) - g(x). Find the absolute minimum value of h(x) on the closed interval  1 2 ≤ x ≤ 1 , and find the absolute maximum of h(x) on the closed interval  1 2 ≤ x ≤ 1 . Show the analysis that leads to your answers.

features.html: Let f and g be the functions given by f(x) = ex and g(x) = ln x.
